entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023
